author: ngn
msg: Fix bug where the namespace prefix and element local name was mixed up

Added XMLElement.getNamespaceURI() which attempts to return the correct namespace URI for the element. Replaced all instanced of using XMLElementVerifier for this purpose (as the method is broken). getNamespaceURI() does not yet support inherited namespaces. Fixes VYSPER-97.
